column2:
0 - The contact is a person
1 - The contact is a company
You can link individuals to companies by putting the name of the company for that person. If is_company is 1, this field should be empty (and will be grayed out)
ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 standard (e.g. : US, MX, FR, DE, ....), or full name (e.g.: Belgium)
For European countries, VAT numbers should be unique
